summary: Removes the leaves from the trees in and around Riften.
descriptionHtml:
If you are running a winter overhaul, or just want a dead forest feeling

Recommended winter related mods

TAVE Whiterun Winter
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25419//?

Winter Riften and Markarth
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32190//?

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11163//?

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28110//?

always snowing
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8306//?

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39450//?

author: Necroburn
